name: @nodejs/timers-deprecations
description: Migrate deprecated node:timers APIs to public timer functions.

scripts.test: node --run test:enroll && node --run test:unenroll && node --run test:active && node --run test:unref && node --run test:imports
scripts.test:enroll: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/enroll-to-set-timeout.ts ./tests/ --filter enroll
scripts.test:unenroll: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/unenroll-to-clear-timer.ts ./tests/ --filter unenroll
scripts.test:active: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/active-to-standard-timer.ts ./tests/ --filter active
scripts.test:unref: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/unref-active-to-unref.ts ./tests/ --filter unref
scripts.test:imports: npx codemod jssg test -l typescript ./src/cleanup-imports.ts ./tests/ --filter imports

author: Augustin Mauroy
